channel.title: Run method
channel.description:
i found this in my run method and i was wondering what it does. [code]if (playerRights == 3) out.write(2); else out.write(playerRights);[/code]
Another question, i also noticed that in earlier winterloves the client implements runnable however, in pi it doesn't. why?

item.title: Run method
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

It’s writing the player rights to the client I believe, so crowns can be assigned

Read full topic
